title: unable to acess our yahoo email, and are being sent to a help for pay number to restore email.  Wife and I have used tha yahoo mail since inception.  is this a scam?t
content: need help accessing our email on yahoo. after answering the security question, in which town was your father born in, it staes that it is the wrong answer, denies access to email and refers us to a pay for help number to restore email. I believe it to be a scam. any way that Firefox can help? If you try to send a message, we can not open our email. therein is the problem.
creator: larryberube
